replies.body: why are they downvoting op when they beat eu in msi today

Salty SKT fans downvoting MSI articles also xD
But srsly if CLG beat SKT I'm going to lmao.
who knows op just stating facts

I down voted cause NA v EU is stupid and childish. All that matters who is number in world not who is 4th between 2 other regions. 

CLG is talking the right way. Its about NA versus the world not EU.

I guess small people can keep looking at the small context.

To be fair, what EU brought to MSI this year was just hilarious. They have three cocky rookies, an ADC who is easily top 10 in the world right now, and a top laner who is known for both his collection of scarves and his uncanny resemblance to a snapping turtle. The fact that they chose not to practice at all before MSI also helps, but still. If I were a team in the EULCS next year, I'd probably make it my goal to not just beat G2 but do it in such a dominating and convincing fashion. Make'm learn their lesson for turning what is a pretty important worlds-related affair into a clown fiesta.

I wouldn't say NA is better than EU just from MSI. G2 is a new team that doesn't have much if any experience against international teams. They remind me a lot of TSM, a team built to win their region, but not international play.

Don't read to hard into it it's just a meme that people do when a team from one region beats the other.

It wouldn't exist if there were more international tournaments though.
